en.haventScannedAllSides: Oops, you did not scan in all 6 sides correctly
en.cubeAlreadySolved: Your cube has already been solved
en.startingPosition:
Starting positionï¼š
front: green
top: white

solveManual.R: Turn the right side a quarter turn away from you.
solveManual.R': Turn the right side a quarter turn towards you.
solveManual.L: Turn the left side a quarter turn towards you.
solveManual.L': Turn the left side a quarter turn away from you.
solveManual.U: Turn the top layer a quarter turn to the left.
solveManual.U': Turn the top layer a quarter turn to the right.
solveManual.D: Turn the bottom layer a quarter turn to the right.
solveManual.D': Turn the bottom layer a quarter turn to the left.
solveManual.B: Turn the back side a quarter turn to the left.
solveManual.B': Turn the back side a quarter turn to the right.
solveManual.F: Turn the front side a quarter turn to the right.
solveManual.F': Turn the front side a quarter turn to the left.
